author: Special Correspondent
text:
Signalling that the Pattali Makkal Katchi(PMK) is ready to face Assembly poll, the party founder S. Ramadoss on Tuesday announced that the aspirants can submit their applications to contest on the party tickets from January 27.

Addressing the media at Thailapuram, Dr. Ramadoss said applications for tickets from aspirants would be received from January 27.

These applications will be received from the aspirants at PMK office in Thailapuram till February 5. Dr. Ramadoss said preference would be given to youth and women in the candidates’ list. He claimed that a private firm has predicted that his party would bag 120 seats in the forthcoming elections and over 62 per cent of voters preferred Anbumani Ramadoss to become the Chief Minister of State.
title: PMK invites applications from poll aspirants
